item.name: SQL query
item.key: system.run[psql -qA -U cs_iogv_alo -c "select * from django_migrations limit 1" 2> /dev/stdout|grep row -c]

item.name: SQL wrong query
item.key: system.run[psql -qA -U cs_iogv_alo -c "select * from django_migra22tions limit 1" 2> /dev/stdout|grep row -c]
